str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and aischunomai; to shame down, i.e. Disgrace or put to the blush.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Or ekchuno ek-khoo'-no from ek and cheo; to pour forth; figuratively, to bestow.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
